heading: Wednesday Night
text: Clear or becoming so, with areas of valley fog late. Lows in the upper 20s to lower 30s, except low to mid 20s in northern cold hollows, and mid to upper 30s near Lake Champlain. Winds becoming light and variable, except remaining north 5 to 10 mph in the Champlain Valley.

heading: Thursday
text: Mostly sunny after any early fog. Valley highs in the low to mid 60s. Variable winds around 5 mph.

heading: Thursday Night
text: Mainly clear. Patchy valley fog, mainly east of the Greens. Lows from the upper 20s to mid 30s, some mid 20s in northern cold hollows, and around 40 near Lake Champlain.
